scripts.dev: concurrently -n "Django+WS,React,Admin" -c "yellow,cyan,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "Django+WS,React,Admin,Chat" -c "yellow,cyan,green,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:chatbot"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && set PYTHONPATH=%CD% && echo Starting Django + WebSocket server... && ..\venv\Scripts\python.exe -m daphne -p 8000 --bind 0.0.0.0 nfc_hospital_system.asgi:application
scripts.dev:db: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate
scripts.dev:ws-test: cd backend && echo Testing WebSocket connectivity... && .\venv\Scripts\python.exe -c "import asyncio; import websockets; print('WebSocket test completed')"
scripts.dev:setup: npm run install:all && npm run dev:db && npm run create:dirs
scripts.type:generate: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && python manage.py generateschema --file openapi-schema.yml && npm run type:convert
scripts.dev:backend:unix: cd backend/nfc_hospital_system && export PYTHONPATH=$PWD && echo 'Starting Django + WebSocket server...' && ../venv/bin/python -m daphne -p 8000 --bind 0.0.0.0 nfc_hospital_system.asgi:application
